languages.text: "В словах твоих звенит страх. Ты знаешь, кто я, и потому я более не могу ступать затененной тропой — время раскрыться".
"There is fear in your words. You know what I am, and so I may no longer follow the shadowed path and must be direct."
languages.original_text: "В словах твоих звенит страх. Ты знаешь, кто я, и потому я более не могу ступать затененной тропой — время раскрыться".

traits.locale_text: "I hear unslaked rage and unbanished fear in your words — you have recognized me for what I am, and such emotions are never far behind. Well, since my path is leading me out of the shadows and into the light, I will be direct in my speech."

"I hear unslaked rage and unbanished fear in your words — you have recognized me for what I am, and such emotions are never far behind. Well, since my path is leading me out of the shadows and into the light, I will be direct in my speech."

"I hear unslaked rage and unbanished fear in your words — you have recognized me for what I am, and such emotions are never far behind. Well, since my path is leading me out of the shadows and into the light, I will be direct in my speech."
"There is fear in your words. You know what I am, and so I may no longer follow the shadowed path and must be direct."

languages.text: “我在你的话语中听到了恐惧，你知道我是谁。既然如此，或许我应该离开阴影中的小径，对你有话直说。”
languages.original_text: "There is fear in your words. You know what I am, and so I may no longer follow the shadowed path and must be direct."

traits.locale_text: “我在你的话语中听到了无法平息的愤怒与无法克制的恐惧。你已经认出了我是谁，而这些情绪从未离你而去。很好，既然我的道途会指引我走出阴影，步向光明，那我就有话直说了。”

languages.text: «Percibo miedo en tus palabras. Me has reconocido por lo que soy, de modo que ya no puedo seguir el camino de las sombras y debo ser directa».
languages.original_text: "There is fear in your words. You know what I am, and so I may no longer follow the shadowed path and must be direct."

traits.locale_text: «Percibo una furia insaciable y un miedo irrefrenable en tus palabras: me has reconocido por lo que soy, y esas emociones nunca andan muy lejos. Ya que mi camino me lleva de las sombras a la luz, hablaré con claridad».

languages.text: 「あなたの言葉には恐怖が見え隠れしている。我のことは分かっているだろう。もう影の道は行かない。真っ向から向かい合う」
languages.original_text: "There is fear in your words. You know what I am, and so I may no longer follow the shadowed path and must be direct."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言葉には恐怖が見え隠れしている。我のことは分かっているだろう。もう影の道は行かない。真っ向から向かい合う」

languages.text: "In Euren Worten liegt Furcht. Ihr wisst, was ich bin, also kann ich nicht länger dem schattenverhangenen Pfad folgen, sondern muss direkt sein."
languages.original_text: "There is fear in your words. You know what I am, and so I may no longer follow the shadowed path and must be direct."

traits.locale_text: "Ich höre ungestillte Wut und Furcht in Euren Worten – Ihr habt erkannt, was ich bin, und dann lassen solche Gefühle nie lange auf sich warten. Doch da mein Pfad mich aus dem Schatten ins Licht führt, will ich offen sein."

languages.text: « Je perçois la peur qui sous-tend vos propos. Puisque vous savez qui je suis, autant tomber le masque et aller droit au but. »
languages.original_text: "There is fear in your words. You know what I am, and so I may no longer follow the shadowed path and must be direct."

traits.locale_text: « Je perçois la colère et la peur indomptées qui imprègnent vos propos. Ces émotions font rapidement surface lorsque l'on reconnait quelqu'un comme moi. Eh bien, puisque ma voie me conduit à sortir de l'ombre pour me présenter au grand jour, je vais vous parler franchement. »

languages.original_text: "There is fear in your words. You know what I am, and so I may no longer follow the shadowed path and must be direct."

languages.text: "Sözlerinde korku var. Madem ne olduğumu biliyorsun, gölgelerden çıkıp doğrudan konuşabilirim."
languages.original_text: "There is fear in your words. You know what I am, and so I may no longer follow the shadowed path and must be direct."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerinde korku var. Madem ne olduğumu biliyorsun, gölgelerden çıkıp doğrudan konuşabilirim."
